sentence.Network_en: What the farmer values still is the cash income beyond autarky.
sentence.Network_cn: 农民看重的还是自给自足以外的现金收入.

sentence.Network_en: One kind is the viewpoint of traditional autarky.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种为传统的自给自足的观点.

sentence.Network_en: Long - term since, in the natural economy that agriculture is in dispersive, backward, autarky all the time.
sentence.Network_cn: 长期以来, 农业一直处于分散 、 落后 、 自给自足的自然经济之中.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 杨-黄模型用交易效率表示不同程度的交易费用,并且引入劳动分工与专业化的思想,在一个更广阔的场景中分析了自给自足(autarky)、企业和市场三种不同的经济结构。按照.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Greek autarkeia, from autarkēs 'self-sufficiency', from autos 'self' + arkein 'suffice'
